Module FinalProject
Package evRentingPlatform

Class RentScooterService

java.lang.Object
evRentingPlatform.RentScooterService
public class RentScooterService extends Object
the instance of the scooter renting service. Contains interactive actions
Author:
linchia-ho

    • searchScooter

      public ArrayList<Scooter> searchScooter(User user, double diameter)
      serach available scooter in given range from user's current position
      Parameters:
      user - who executes searching
      diameter - diameter of searching circle in Kilometer
      Returns:
      the list of scooters which are available in given range; if no suitable scooter is found then null

    • rentScooter

      public boolean rentScooter(User user, Scooter scooter)
      start renting the scooter, will trigger following actions: (1) store Scooter inside User to represent the action of renting a scooter, (2) update user's position to scooter's position (3) Switch scooter's status to occupied (4) new a RentHistory to user
      Parameters:
      user - user who rents the scooter
      scooter - the scooter been rent
      Returns:

    • rideScooter

      public boolean rideScooter(User user)
      start riding scooter, the position will be updated and recorded to the rentHistory
      Parameters:
      user - target user
      Returns:
      true if successfully executed; otherwise false

    • stopRidingScooter

      public boolean stopRidingScooter(User user)
      temporarily stop updating position and recording rentHistory
      Parameters:
      user - target user
      Returns:
      true if successfully executed; otherwise false

    • searchChargingStation

      public ArrayList<ChargingStation> searchChargingStation(User user)
      search charging stations within default distance from the user's current position
      Parameters:
      position - current user position
      Returns:
      the list of ChargingStation within default distance; if no suitable charging station is found then null

    • moveToChargingStation

      public boolean moveToChargingStation(User user, ChargingStation chargingStation)
      move to the selected charging station, if the remain battery is not enough, this action will not be executed The transfer efficiency is set at 1Km-to-1% of battery
      Parameters:
      user - target user
      chargingStation - target charging station
      Returns:
      true if successfully executed; otherwise false

    • chargeScooter

      public boolean chargeScooter(User user)
      rewrite scooter's battery to 100 and generate a coupon to the user
      Parameters:
      user - user who execute charging
      Returns:
      true if successfully executed; otherwise false

    • endRidingScooter

      public boolean endRidingScooter(User user)

      Parameters:
      user - target user
      Returns:
      true if successfully executed; otherwise false

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • payFeeAndReturnScooter

      public double payFeeAndReturnScooter(User user, Coupon coupon)
      represents properly terminate the renting, execute the following actions: (1) calculate the fee with coupon checking (2) archived the rent history (3) decouple the scooter from the user
      Parameters:
      user - target user
      coupon - usable coupon
      Returns:
      the proper rent fee; otherwise return -1

    • payFeeAndReturnScooter

      public double payFeeAndReturnScooter(User user)
      represents properly terminate the renting, execute the following actions: (1) calculate the fee with no coupon (2) archived the rent history (3) decouple the scooter from the user
      Parameters:
      user - target user
      Returns:
      the proper rent fee; otherwise return -1

    • searchMalfunctionScooter

      public ArrayList<Scooter> searchMalfunctionScooter(Repairman repairman)
      search for malfunction scooters
      Parameters:
      repairman - repairman who execute searching
      Returns:
      the list of all malfunction scooters; otherwise null

    • fixScooter

      public boolean fixScooter(Repairman repairman, Scooter scooter)
      fixes a scooter, will switch the status of a scooter from Malfunction to IDLE.
      Parameters:
      repairman - repairman who execute the fixing
      scooter - the scooter to be fixed
      Returns:
      true if successfully executed; otherwise false

    • chargeLowBatteryScooter

      public boolean chargeLowBatteryScooter(Repairman repairman, Scooter scooter)
      charge a scooter. Then relocate the scooter to a different position
      Parameters:
      repairman -
      Returns:
      true if successfully executed; otherwise false
